laboratory_examinations.findings: Mildly hypoattenuating mass in the pancreas head with pancreatic duct narrowing; dilatation of the main pancreatic duct up to 0.9 cm; previous rim enhancing fluid collection in the pancreas tail decreased in size from 6.5 x 2.5 cm to 5.8 x 1.8 cm.
laboratory_examinations.changes_over_time: The fluid collection size decreased from 6.5 x 2.5 cm to 5.8 x 1.8 cm.
